channel.title: Comments on: Vanity, Thy Name is Wiki User Pages

item.title: By: Tara
item.dc:creator: Tara
item.description:
Um, maybe you're British and it's different there. But Sepulcher is spelled like that everywhere I've seen it in game. :) Just double checked the official site, and if you click through on the map to Silverpine Forest, it's there, <a href="http://www.worldofwarcraft.com/info/flashmap/index.html" rel="nofollow">The Sepulcher</a>.
I, too, love Wikipedia.
item.content:encoded:
Um, maybe you’re British and it’s different there. But Sepulcher is spelled like that everywhere I’ve seen it in game. ðŸ™‚ Just double checked the official site, and if you click through on the map to Silverpine Forest, it’s there, The Sepulcher.

I, too, love Wikipedia.

item.title: By: Chris
item.dc:creator: Chris
item.description:
I love Wikipedia. I fixed a couple obvious errors in that biography (the spelling of "The Sepulchre" and "Eastern Kingdoms," not Kalimdor n00b).
I always had a soft spot for Allakhazam's character profiles, but I found it to be unreliable at updating all our characters.
item.content:encoded:
I love Wikipedia. I fixed a couple obvious errors in that biography (the spelling of “The Sepulchre” and “Eastern Kingdoms,” not Kalimdor n00b).

I always had a soft spot for Allakhazam’s character profiles, but I found it to be unreliable at updating all our characters.

item.title: By: Tara
item.dc:creator: Tara
item.description: It's true, there are way too many. I've tried thottbot (you can see my character profiles on my blog from thottbot) and WarcraftRealms, but the best way I found was to use Character Profiler and host it yourself. My <a href="http://www.crazycattle.com/roster" rel="nofollow">guild website</a> does that. That's one of the best all around packages I've seen. But yeah, there's about a hundred different options and everyone's using one of them.
item.content:encoded: It’s true, there are way too many. I’ve tried thottbot (you can see my character profiles on my blog from thottbot) and WarcraftRealms, but the best way I found was to use Character Profiler and host it yourself. My guild website does that. That’s one of the best all around packages I’ve seen. But yeah, there’s about a hundred different options and everyone’s using one of them.
